text: A Hungarian Fairy Tale is a 1988 Hungarian fantasy movie directed by Gyula Gazdag and starring Dávid Vermes, Mária Varga, František Husák and Eszter Csákányi. == Other websites == * Category:1988 fantasy movies Category:1980s family movies Category:Hungarian movies Category:Movies directed by Gyula Gazdag Category:Movies set in Budapest Category:Movies about orphans
title: A Hungarian Fairy Tale
